text: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

translation.en: Whom Allah has cursed. For he had said, "I will surely take from among Your servants a specific portion
translation.id: yang dilaknati Allah, dan (setan) itu mengatakan, "Aku pasti akan mengambil bagian tertentu dari hamba-hamba-Mu
